title: Diff. eq. with slope field and tang. line approx. part - b

content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the solution curve in part (a) at the point (0,1). Use the equation to approximate f(0.2) .

frqParts.text: Write an equation for the line tangent to the solution curve in part (a) at the point (0,1). Use the equation to approximate f(0.2) .

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
